title: Episode 7 - Danny Meyer, Founder & CEO, Union Square Hospitality Group
description: In this discussion about the evolving intersection of hospitality and technology, Danny Meyer talks about shaking up - and shaping - the restaurant of the future. (Interviewed by Vonnie Quinn)
dc:creator: Bloomberg
